    • Method Detail

      • healthScale

        ImmutableBoundedValue<Double> healthScale()
        Defines the amount of health to show client-side (in hearts) such that the maximum health is the value of this scale, and the current health is scaled as a ratio.

        If the current maximum health is 400, and the player has 200, but the scale dictates 20, then the client will see 5 hearts (or 10 half hearts) out of 10 hearts.

        Returns:
        The value for the health scale
